name: Portuguese English Translator
description: This free app is able to translate words and text from Portuguese to English, and from English to Portuguese. Best app for easy and fast translations, which can be used like a dictionary. If you are a student, tourist or traveler , it will helps you to learn the language!   This translator contains the following features: - Translate words and sentences - Translate from clipboard - Simple and user-friendly interface - Instant search - Instant start  Tradutor gratuito de Portugus para Ingls e de Ingls para Portugus. Free translator from Portuguese to English, and from English to Portuguese.
